page.title: 20Bondleigh Factual
page.content: Despite its isolation, this small hamlet of Bondleigh has a daily mail delivery and 2 collections; milk and bread deliveries 3 days a week; weekly refuse collection; mobile County Library every 2 weeks. Daily school bus service takes children to and from North Tawton and Okehampton. Recently, four new houses have been built; old cottages restored and modernised by newcomers; two further building plots for sale - all beneficial for local economy. A telephone kiosk provides a communication link with the outside world, and provides another focal point with the notice board at the bridge, together with the church and chapel embracing the whole of tranquil hamlet.
